column4: BRIEF-Sharing Economy International - Unit Entered Into Amendment To A License Agreement With Ecrent Capital Holdings
column6: * SHARING ECONOMY INTERNATIONAL - UNIT ENTERED INTO AN AMENDMENT TO A LICENSE AGREEMENT, DATED MAY 8, 2018 WITH ECRENT CAPITAL HOLDINGS LIMITED
column7: * SHARING ECONOMY INTERNATIONAL - IN CONSIDERATION FOR LICENSE, CO SHALL GRANT ECRENT 250,000 SHARES OF COMMON STOCK AT US$4.30 PER SHARE
column8: * SHARING ECONOMY INTERNATIONAL INC - ECRENT SHALL PROVIDE A GUARANTEE ON REVENUE AND PROFIT OF US$10 MILLION AND US$1.94 MILLION RESPECTIVELY
column9: * SHARING ECONOMY INTERNATIONAL - CONSIDERATION SHARES SHALL BE REDUCED ON A PRO RATA BASIS IF THERE IS A SHORTFALL IN GUARANTEED REVENUE AND/OR PROFIT
column10: * SHARING ECONOMY INTERNATIONAL INC - PER TERMS ECRENT SHALL GRANT SEIL AN EXCLUSIVE LICENSE TO UTILIZE CERTAIN SOFTWARE AND TRADEMARKS
column11: * SHARING ECONOMY INTERNATIONAL - LICENSE TO ALSO MAINTAIN WEBSITE PLATFORM IN TAIWAN, THAILAND, INDIA, OTHER COUNTRIES UNTIL JUNE 30, 2019 - SEC FILING Source text: (bit.ly/2IIbuaH) Further company coverage:
